text: “Mba tɨvi hɨrim, nde tuituigira wari ganɨri. Gumgi thari nde ndigip, ŋgɨv ŋgu gari gumgi han ŋgɨgɨrga. Gumgi thari Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararagi phenir hor mbatɨgar nden muunga. Gumgi thari nde ndim ŋgui gari gumgi bakɨvi gum ŋgui vhɨrve za gari gumgi bakɨvi nɨman fɨv, nde ndiv suanga. Mbe na zɨ suaŋv mba tɨvir nden muunga. Nde mbe nɨman thivɨv, mba nden hegi bigi bun mbe suanga.
